ChildBranches.Name: Fight!
ChildBranches.Description: When all's said, it's just a really big fish in a cage. And you - you are a zee-captain.

DefaultEvent.Description: $[Bb]ound[ -][Ss]hark -> バウンド・シャーク$You fling your least-disciplined zailor overboard. The Bound-Shark snaps him up in a trio of instants, but those instants are long enough to get clear. Your crew, it is fair to say, are not impressed. Well, perhaps they'll be next.
DefaultEvent.Name: A bad end

ChildBranches.Name: Flee!
ChildBranches.Description: It's nimbler than you are. But perhaps you can distract it with a zailor. Your crew won't like this, though -

Description: "The most tormented of zee-beasts. Its murderous eyes peep from its caged flesh like convicts begging release."
Name: $[Bb]ound[ -][Ss]hark -> バウンド・シャーク$The Bound Shark attacks!
